body.p: But owing to the entry on the record & the facts not being shown by plea or proof the appellate court reversed the case and sent it Back to be reinvestigated the above is a true statement of the facts

It will be seen by reference to the case of Comth gt Spraggins page 512, 18th B. Monroe, that the right to the of the Comth's Atto, To the per cent "only accrues upon judgments upon forfeited Recongizances" -- & that the Governor has the power to remit the whole forfeiture (if it be a forfeiture) before Judgt has been entered.
